      Returns:
      Singleton instance of DatabaseController

    • initialize

      public boolean initialize() throws SQLException, FileNotFoundException
      Initialize the database with the SQL scripts in initialiser.sql
      Returns:
      Returns true if connection is open and the SQL is proceeded successfully
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is any SQL error happening
      FileNotFoundException - If the file is missing
